verses.verse: Now Moses <WH4872> kept <WH7462> the flock <WH6629> of Jethro <WH3503> his father <WH2859> in law, <WH2859> the priest <WH3548> of Midian: <WH4080> and he led <WH5090> the flock <WH6629> to the backside <WH310> of the desert, <WH4057> and came <WH935> to the mountain <WH2022> of God, <WH430> even to Horeb. <WH2722>

And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to him in a flame <WH3827> of fire <WH784> out of the middle <WH8432> of a bush: <WH5572> and he looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> the bush <WH5572> burned <WH1197> with fire, <WH784> and the bush <WH5572> was not consumed. <WH398>
And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> I will now <WH4994> turn <WH5493> aside, and see <WH7200> this <WH2088> great <WH1419> sight, <WH4758> why <WH4069> the bush <WH5572> is not burnt. <WH1197>

And when the LORD <WH3068> saw <WH7200> that he turned <WH5493> aside to see, <WH7200> God <WH430> called <WH7121> to him out of the middle <WH8432> of the bush, <WH5572> and said, <WH559> Moses, <WH4872> Moses. <WH4872> And he said, <WH559> Here <WH2009> am I.

And he said, <WH559> Draw not near <WH7126> here: <WH1988> put <WH5394> off your shoes <WH5275> from off your feet, <WH7272> for the place <WH4725> where on <WH834> <WH5921> you stand <WH5975> is holy <WH6944> ground. <WH127>

Moreover he said, <WH559> I am the God <WH430> of your father, <WH1> the God <WH430> of Abraham, <WH85> the God <WH430> of Isaac, <WH3327> and the God <WH430> of Jacob. <WH3290> And Moses <WH4872> hid <WH5641> his face; <WH6440> for he was afraid <WH3372> to look <WH5027> on God. <WH430>

And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> I have surely seen <WH7200> the affliction <WH6040> of my people <WH5971> which <WH834> are in Egypt, <WH4714> and have heard <WH8085> their cry <WH6818> by reason <WH6440> of their taskmasters; <WH5065> for I know <WH3045> their sorrows; <WH4341>

And I am come <WH3381> down <WH3381> to deliver <WH5337> them out of the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians, <WH4714> and to bring <WH5927> them up out of that land <WH776> to a good <WH2896> land <WH776> and a large, <WH7342> to a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey; <WH1706> to the place <WH4725> of the Canaanites, <WH3669> and the Hittites, <WH2850> and the Amorites, <WH567> and the Perizzites, <WH6522> and the Hivites, <WH2340> and the Jebusites. <WH2983>

Now <WH6258> therefore, behold, <WH2009> the cry <WH6818> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> is come <WH935> to me: and I have also <WH1571> seen <WH7200> the oppression <WH3906> with which <WH834> the Egyptians <WH4714> oppress <WH3905> them.

Come <WH3212> now <WH6258> therefore, and I will send <WH7971> you to Pharaoh, <WH6547> that you may bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> my people <WH5971> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of Egypt. <WH4714>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to God, <WH430> Who <WH4310> am I, that I should go <WH3212> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and that I should bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of Egypt? <WH4714>

And he said, <WH559> Certainly <WH3588> I will be with you; and this <WH2088> shall be a token <WH226> to you, that I have sent <WH7971> you: When you have brought <WH3318> forth <WH3318> the people <WH5971> out of Egypt, <WH4714> you shall serve <WH5647> God <WH430> on this <WH2088> mountain. <WH2022>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to God, <WH430> Behold, <WH2009> when I come <WH935> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and shall say <WH559> to them, The God <WH430> of your fathers <WH1> has sent <WH7971> me to you; and they shall say <WH559> to me, What <WH4100> is his name? <WH8034> what <WH4100> shall I say <WH559> to them?

And God <WH430> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> I AM <WH1961> THAT I AM: <WH1961> and he said, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> shall you say <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> I AM <WH1961> has sent <WH7971> me to you.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> moreover <WH5750> to Moses, <WH4872> Thus shall you say <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of your fathers, <WH1> the God <WH430> of Abraham, <WH85> the God <WH430> of Isaac, <WH3327> and the God <WH430> of Jacob, <WH3290> has sent <WH7971> me to you: this <WH2088> is my name <WH8034> for ever, <WH5769> and this <WH2088> is my memorial <WH2143> to all generations. <WH1755>

Go, <WH3212> and gather <WH622> the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> together, and say <WH559> to them, The LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of your fathers, <WH1> the God <WH430> of Abraham, <WH85> of Isaac, <WH3327> and of Jacob, <WH3290> appeared <WH7200> to me, saying, <WH559> I have surely visited <WH6485> you, and seen that which <WH834> is done <WH6213> to you in Egypt: <WH4714>

And I have said, <WH559> I will bring <WH5927> you up out of the affliction <WH6040> of Egypt <WH4714> to the land <WH776> of the Canaanites, <WH3669> and the Hittites, <WH2850> and the Amorites, <WH567> and the Perizzites, <WH6522> and the Hivites, <WH2340> and the Jebusites, <WH2983> to a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>

And they shall listen <WH8085> to your voice: <WH6963> and you shall come, <WH935> you and the elders <WH2205> of Israel, <WH3478> to the king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and you shall say <WH559> to him, The LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680> has met <WH7136> with us: and now <WH6258> let us go, <WH3212> we beseech <WH4994> you, three <WH7969> days' <WH3117>journey <WH1870> into the wilderness, <WH4057> that we may sacrifice <WH2076> to the LORD <WH3068> our God. <WH430>
And I am sure <WH3045> that the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> will not let <WH5414> you go, <WH1980> no, <WH3808> not by a mighty <WH2389> hand. <WH3027>

And I will stretch <WH7971> out my hand, <WH3027> and smite <WH5221> Egypt <WH4714> with all <WH3605> my wonders <WH6381> which <WH834> I will do <WH6213> in the middle <WH7130> thereof: and after <WH310> that he will let you go. <WH7971>

And I will give <WH5414> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the Egyptians: <WH4714> and it shall come <WH1961> to pass, that, when you go, <WH3212> you shall not go <WH3212> empty. <WH7387>

But every woman <WH802> shall borrow <WH7592> of her neighbor, <WH7934> and of her that sojournes <WH1481> in her house, <WH1004> jewels <WH3627> of silver, <WH3701> and jewels <WH3627> of gold, <WH2091> and raiment: <WH8071> and you shall put <WH7760> them on your sons, <WH1121> and on your daughters; <WH1323> and you shall spoil <WH5337> the Egyptians. <WH4714>
